channel.title: Coder wanted, Zombie style survival server recoded
channel.description:
Well with the 'Execution' of most quality remakes, i looked through old files to find a survival style server base.
many things need fixing and adding, but i believe it has a lot of potential such as eco options like Killing zombies for money, woodcutting to make them into barricades at a certain level. Raids of towns/dungeons (this is almost done)
its probably been done before so dont rage, i could not find it.
Anywho, i want someone to help code it, when it is satisfactory i will buy the vps to host it :)
add me or brother on skype, or comment with your skype names
me : nikki.auroea brother: chris.davies4841
